          <title>
            <string language="sl">Masno središče dveh gibajočih se delcev povezanih z vzmetjo</string>
            <string language="en">Center of mass of 2 moving particles connected with spring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse von 2 beweglichen Partikeln 
schloß an Frühling an</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le centre de la masse de 2 particules mobiles 
s'est relié au ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O centro de uma massa de 2 partículas moventes 
conectou com a mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il centro di una massa di 2 particelle commoventi
ha collegato con la molla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κέντρο της μάζας 2 κινούμενων μορίων που συνδέονται 
με την άνοιξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El centro de la masa de 2 partículas móviles 
conectó con el resorte</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Gibanje dveh masnih delcev povezanih z vzmetjo in masno središče sistema.</string>
            <string language="en">Motion of two particles connected with spring and change of center of mass of such system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">masno središče</string>
            <string language="en">center of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzmet</string>
            <string language="en">spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">templates</string>
            <string language="en">templates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung von zwei Partikeln schloß an Frühling 
und an Änderung der Mitte der Masse solchen Systems an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouvement de deux particules s'est relié au 
ressort et au changement du centre de la masse d'un tel système.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O movimento de duas partículas conectou com a 
mola e a mudança do centro da massa de tal sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un movimento di due particelle ha collegato con 
la molla ed il cambiamento del centro di massa di tale sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνηση δύο μορίων που συνδέονται με την άνοιξη και 
την αλλαγή του κέντρου της μάζας τέτοιου συστήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El movimiento de dos partículas conectó con el 
resorte y el cambio del centro de la masa de tal sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
